original_text: “Say to the people of Israel, Any one of the people of Israel or of the strangers who sojourn in Israel who gives any of his children to Molech shall surely be put to death. The people of the land shall stone him with stones.
korean_text: 너는 이스라엘 자손에게 또 이르라 그가 이스라엘 자손이든지 이스라엘에 거류하는 거류민이든지 그의 자식을 몰렉에게 주면 반드시 죽이되 그 지방 사람이 돌로 칠 것이요

sentences.original_text: Say to the people of Israel,
Any one of the people of Israel
or of the strangers who sojourn in Israel
who gives any of his children to Molech
shall surely be put to death.
The people of the land shall stone him with stones.
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 백성이 그를 돌로 쳐 죽일지니라
